pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:0.5: 49. The training rule on studying pointless knowledge
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.2: At that time the nuns from the group of six were studying pointless knowledge.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.4: “How can nuns study pointless knowledge? They are just like householders who indulge in sensual pleasures.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.5: The nuns heard the complaints of those people,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.6: and the nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.7: “How can the nuns from the group of six study pointless knowledge?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.8: “Is it true, monks, those nuns do that?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.11: “… How can the nuns from the group of six study pointless knowledge?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.12: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.13: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:1.14: ‘If a nun studies pointless knowledge, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.6: whatever is external to the Buddha’s Teaching, not connected with what is beneficial.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.8: if she learns by the line, then for every line she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.1.9: If she learns by the syllable, then for every syllable she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.2.4: if she learns verses for the purpose of protection;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.2.6: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc49:2.2.7: The ninth training rule is finished.
